idea:
SalaryNext by AJT Technologies helps individuals provides temporary income protection, on sudden loss of job or income and find new jobs faster.


Individuals can pay an annual premium and reduce the impact of job loss and fluctuations in job market.


SalaryNext also enables employers to buy cover for all their employees, and thus contribute to their well being while strengthening the employer brand, increasing retention and improving hiring.
name: AJT Technologies Private Limited
